snippet: Mr. Covey had an enduring best seller in “The Seven Habits of Highly Effective People,” a synthesis of self-help and business literature.
abstract: Stephen R Covey, author of best-seller The Seven Habits of Highly Effective People: Restoring the Character Ethic, dies at age 79.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Covey had an enduring best seller in “The Seven Habits of Highly Effective People,” a synthesis of self-help and business literature.

headline.seo: Stephen R. Covey, Herald of Good Habits, Dies at 79
headline.main: Stephen R. Covey, Herald of Good Habits, Dies at 79
headline.print_headline: Stephen R. Covey, Herald Of Good Habits, Dies at 79
